attributes.action: Legalise medical and recreational cannabis in the uk
attributes.additional_details:
Cannabis has been used for thousands of years for medicinal and recreational purposes, 
It is a perfectly safe plant and has never killed a single sole unlike alcohol, tobacco and other drugs of choice
The people of the United Kingdom should be able to ease there pain and suffering and to understand exactly what they are buying in a proper shop rather than risking getting a criminal record and waiting in dark dingy alleys to hand your cash over to joe blogs when it could be profiting our country to help make Britain great again
attributes.background:
Now that the UK has left the EU legalise, regulate and stop the ban on a perfectly safe PLANT
Bring millions back into Our country and make the uk great again
